name: Perdytacks
description:
Take a break from your 9-5 office job, point'n'click your magic portal and join us on a journey to the mysterious and magical world of Perdytacks! May works at a boring desk job writing reports about reports until Percy, a brass robot owl visits her world to let her know that her twin in an alternate dimension, Agusta the princess of Perdytacks has been kidnapped and he needs your help to save her.

Also check out our Desura page to see our misleading trailer!
